Price: 6.00

Girls Just Want To Have Fun Loot Bags

Loot Bags filled with Fresh Candy

Let loose with your BFF's with our "Girls Just Want To Have Fun" Loot Bag! A great sweet treat for a Bachelorette Party, Wedding Shower or a Birthday Party Favour. Or maybe to bring along on an all-girls road trip. Of course, us girls want to have fun but most importantly, we want to eat candy!
